configuration:
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname {{ include "hadoop.fullname" . }}-resourcemanager-hl
yarn.resourcemanager.bind-host 0.0.0.0
yarn.nodemanager.bind-host 0.0.0.0
yarn.timeline-service.bind-host 0.0.0.0
yarn.nodemanager.vmem-check-enabled false
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.mapreduce_shuffle.class org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ShuffleHandler
List of directories to store localized files in. yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs /data/${user.name}/nm-local-dir
Where to store container logs. yarn.nodemanager.log-dirs /var/log/hadoop-yarn/containers
Where to aggregate logs to. yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir /var/log/hadoop-yarn/apps
The address for the web proxy as HOST:PORT, if this is not given then the proxy will run as part of the RM. yarn.web-proxy.address 1080
yarn.application.classpath
/opt/hadoop/etc/hadoop, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/common/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/common/lib/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/hdfs/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/hdfs/lib/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/mapreduce/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/mapreduce/lib/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/yarn/*, /opt/hadoop/share/hadoop/yarn/lib/*
{{- range $key, $value := index .Values.conf "yarnSite" }} {{ $key }}{{ $value }} {{- end }}
